visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing the comparison of organic agricultural areas across 10 European countries in 2012 versus 2018 using synthetic data with realistic growth patterns and statistical variance

title.text: Synthetic Organic Agricultural Area Comparison: 2012 vs 2018

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two quantitative series comparing agricultural areas across 10 categorical country entities. Synthetic values were generated maintaining the original data's statistical profile (2012: μ=385kha, σ=170; 2018: μ=455kha, σ=180) with 25% average growth reflecting Eurostat's observed trends. The dual-color bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio through direct color contrast, aligning with Cairo's principles of salience for immediate pattern recognition. Value labels and tick intervals maintain proportional accuracy while avoiding chart junk. Country codes follow ISO 3166 standards for domain consistency, and the 200kha y-axis interval optimizes magnitude estimation while preserving resolution for smaller values.
